entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
